text: Ammuvinte Aattinkutty is a 1978 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Ramu Kariat and produced by Sobhana Parameswaran Nair. ==Cast== *Baby Vinitha *Baby Meera *Baby Vidya *Baby Renuka *Thrissur Sasi *Thrissur Elsy *Bahadoor *PK Abraham *K V Manikantan Nair *Abbas ==References== ==External links== * Category:1978 films Category:Indian films Category:1970s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by Ramu Kariat
title: Ammuvinte Aattinkutty
